name: Open the path !
description:
Help the knight survive the fire by removing obstacles in his path !

The level is always the same, just with more obstacle every time.

Only one way to interact with the game : the mouse !

Drag and drop the wooden planks to fill the holes, move the sawblades out of the way and open doors at the right time !

*****Controls********************

Use left mouse button to interact with objects.

For the firsts levels, I recommend to use right mouse button to run faster 

By the way, thats my first game and I hope you will like it :)
